text: Virus is the tenth studio album works of Indonesian music group, Slank. Which was released in 2001. It contains 13 songs with the song Virus and # 1 as the hits singles this album ==Track listing== Category:Slank albums Category:2001 albums ==Personnel== *Bimbim – drums, percussion, backing vocals *Kaka – lead vocals, percussion *Abdee Negara – lead guitar, slide guitar, tambourine, mixing *Ridho Hafiedz – rhythm guitar, acoustic guitar, piano *Ivanka – bass, tambourine
title: Virus (Slank album)
